name: Clockwork Menagerie
blurb: (PC Game) A 1-8 Player, Steampunk, Party Fighter

rewards.reward: THE CLOCKWORK HELPER\r\n\r\nYou have our sincere thanks for helping out!
THE COMMON GAMER (A)\r\nYou receive a digital copy of the game when it comes out.
THE SOCIAL GAMER (B)\r\nYou receive reward 'A' and a founder title on our official Forums when they are put up.

THE CLOCKWORK FOUNDER (C)\r\nYou receive rewards 'A' and 'B' and your name and/or internet alias will appear in game credits. If we reach $80,000 your copy of the game will automatically become the digital collectors edition!

THE CLOCKWORK TINKERER (D)\r\nYou receive rewards 'A', 'B' and 'C' and you will have access to Pre-Release Closed Founder Beta when we reach that level of development. If we reach $80,000 your copy of the game will automatically become the digital collectors edition!

THE CLOCKWORK CHARACTER (E) You receive rewards 'A', 'B', 'C', 'D' and an Official Character T-Shirt.  (See special note about shipping in the main text section...)\r\nIf we reach $80,000 your copy of the game will automatically become the digital collectors edition!

THE CLOCKWORK VISAGE (F)\r\nYou receive rewards 'A', 'B', 'C' and 'D' and a Limited Edition Official Game T-Shirt. Will come with a signed certificate of authenticity. Shirt will say "Founder" and have special artwork compared to the character shirts from reward 'E'. (See special note about shipping in the main text section...) If we reach $80,000 your copy of the game will automatically become the digital collectors edition!

THE CLOCKWORK HISTORIAN (G)\r\nYou receive rewards 'A', 'B', 'C', D, ('E' or 'F') and two prints of signed game artwork by one of our game artists. (We will be in contact with backers in this category to communicate requested designs and E or F selection.) (See special note about shipping in the main text section...) If we reach $80,000 your copy of the game will automatically become the digital collectors edition!

THE CLOCKWORK WATCHER (H) You receive rewards 'A', 'B', 'C', D, ('E' or 'F') and Communicate with us directly and have a character of your concept and design put into the game AS A BYSTANDER. Bystanders watch the battle and have a cheering animation. (Characters would be subject to approval before design would begin. These characters can be of unique design and do not need to be historical in nature. It could even be a recreation of you!!! Characters of this kind would either be in at release or during a post release update.) If we reach $80,000 your copy of the game will automatically become the digital collectors edition!

THE CLOCKWORK TUBER (I) You receive rewards 'A', 'B', 'C', D, ('E' or 'F'), 'G' and 'H' and an Interview with the Lead Developer via Skype (or in person depending on your location.) for you to record and upload to your YouTube page.

- YOUTUBE USERS ONLY PLEASE AS THIS REWARD IS SPECIFIC TO THAT PLATFORM -

When - Interview will take place some time before the Founder Beta, as to give you a chance at an early look behind the scenes to share with your subscribers! We will link the interview on our site when you put it up to generate flow to your page! If we reach $80,000 your copy of the game will automatically become the digital collectors edition!

THE CLOCKWORK COUNCIL MEMBER (J)\r\nYou receive rewards 'A', 'B', 'C', D, ('E' or 'F'), 'G' and communicate with us directly and have a historical character of your concept and design put into the game as a PLAYABLE character. (Characters would be subject to approval before design would begin. Characters would either be in at release or during a post release update.) If we reach $80,000 your copy of the game will automatically become the digital collectors edition!

THE CLOCKWORK BUILDER (K)
You receive rewards 'A', 'B', 'C', D, 'E', 'F', 'G', 'H' and 'J'. Receive a Skype or phone call(s) from the Development Team for a special thank you.
A special gift bag in the mail with as many unique Clockwork Menagerie related goodies we can fit in it. Items signed by the developers too!
Super Special call-out In the Game Credits. If we reach $80,000 your copy of the game will automatically become the digital collectors edition!

THE CLOCKWORK ARCHITECT (L)\r\nYou receive rewards 'A', 'B', 'C', D, 'E', 'F', 'G', 'H', ('I' is optional) 'J' and 'K' and be flown out to spend a few days with members of the team and be here for the release day party! (We are centered in Maine, USA. This of course is subject to you having the correct passports, being over 18, etc etc.) If we reach $80,000 your copy of the game will automatically become the digital collectors edition!
